Specimen Type: Pleural fluid, peritoneal fluid, cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), synovial fluid
Purpose: To quantitatively measure protein concentration in body fluids for diagnostic evaluation and patient monitoring.
Container: Plain sterile container (pleural, peritoneal, synovial fluids) or CSF collection tube
Equipment: Protein assay kit with spectrophotometer or automated analyzer, pipettes, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer
